title: Kathleen O’Neill Retiring From ARC
text:
Kathleen O’Neill Retiring From ARC July 14, 2015 
Kathleen O’Neill, vice president and general counsel of the Airlines Reporting Corporation (ARC), will retire on July 31. O’Neill spent most of her legal career in aviation and has played a critical role in some important industry innovations, including the move to electronic ticketing. O’Neill will leave to act as principal at a consulting service named Discerning Ways. 
“The enormous amount of contributions Kathi has made to the travel industry is endless,” said Mike Premo, ARC president and CEO. “I will personally miss her forthright counsel and camaraderie as a member of the executive team, and thank her for all she has done for ARC and the industry.” 0
